trans-unit.source: A package for unsupervised time series anomaly detection
trans-unit.target: 一个用于无监督时间序列异常检测的软件包。

trans-unit.source: ADTK is licensed under the Mozilla Public License 2.0 (MPL 2.0). See the LICENSE file for details.
trans-unit.target: ADTK根据Mozilla Public License 2.0（MPL 2.0）获得许可。有关详细信息，请参见 LICENSE文件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you could install from source code. This will give you the latest, but unstable, version of ADTK.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以从源代码安装。这将为您提供最新的但不稳定的ADTK版本。

trans-unit.source: Anomaly Detection Toolkit (ADTK) is a Python package for unsupervised / rule-based time series anomaly detection.
trans-unit.target: 异常检测工具包(ADTK)是一个Python包,用于无监督/基于规则的时间序列异常检测。

trans-unit.source: As the nature of anomaly varies over different cases, a model may not work universally for all anomaly detection problems. Choosing and combining detection algorithms (detectors), feature engineering methods (transformers), and ensemble methods (aggregators) properly is the key to build an effective anomaly detection model.
trans-unit.target: 由于不同情况下异常的性质不同,一个模型不一定能普遍适用于所有的异常检测问题。正确选择和组合检测算法(检测器)、特征工程方法(变换器)和集合方法(聚合器)是建立有效的异常检测模型的关键。

trans-unit.source: For more detailed examples of each module of ADTK, please refer to Examples section in the documentation or an interactive demo notebook.
trans-unit.target: 有关ADTK每个模块的更多详细示例，请参阅 文档中的“ 示例”部分或交互式演示笔记本。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to install the most recent stable release of ADTK from PyPI.
trans-unit.target: 建议安装来自PyPI的ADTK的最新稳定版本。

trans-unit.source: Please make sure to update unit tests as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 请确保适当更新单元测试。
请参阅贡献以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Please see Quick Start for a simple example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅快速入门中的简单示例。

trans-unit.source: Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎提出拉动请求。对于重大的改动,请先开一个问题来讨论你想改动的内容。
有关完整的文档，请参见https://adtk.readthedocs.io。

trans-unit.source: This package offers a set of common detectors, transformers and aggregators with unified APIs, as well as pipe classes that connect them together into models. It also provides some functions to process and visualize time series and anomaly events.
trans-unit.target: 该包提供了一套通用的检测器、变换器和聚合器,具有统一的API,以及将它们连接在一起成为模型的管道类。它还提供了一些函数来处理和可视化时间序列和异常事件。
